sentence: GOP Rep. Liz Cheney last week amid her campaign for reelection said she didn't need to "convince the crazies" in her party over her voting record and her decisions to break with former President Donald Trump.
author: John L. Dorman
title: 'I reject the crazies': Liz Cheney blasts Wyoming GOP leadership over notion that she prioritizes Trump battles over reelection bid
